docs.lead_paragraph: Defense counsel filed a long list of exceptions to Justice Thomas Trenchard's charge to the jury. These were based chiefly on the contention that the Court had included in the charge a number of inferences that should have been left to the Jury.

headline.main: Exceptions by Defense to Judge's Charge

docs.snippet: Defense counsel filed a long list of exceptions to Justice Thomas Trenchard's charge to the jury. These were based chiefly on the contention that the Court had included in the charge a number of inferences that should have been left to the Jury.
